quote: From now on, the earth will never cease to have seed-sowing and harvest, cold and heat, summer and winter, and day and night.”
Then Solʹo·mon stood before the altar of Jehovah in front of all the congregation of Israel, and he spread his hands out to the heavens,
One day he and his disciples got into a boat, and he said to them: “Let us cross to the other side of the lake.” So they set sail.
